title: Automata
description: Automata are the lead developer of Star Atlas, a next-gen MMORPG metaverse emerging from the confluence of the Solana blockchain, Unreal Engine 5â€™s real-time graphics technology and decentralized financial protocols. Developed by by ATMTA Inc., Star Atlas combines play-to-earn NFT mechanics with an AAA cinematic space-genre experience creating an economy that replicates the tangibility of real world assets and ownership.
